Secure and offline Bitcoin wallet generator.

This app replicates exactly the standard Bitcoin cryptographic logic:
• SHA-256 for entropy
• ECDSA (secp256k1) for keys
• RIPEMD-160 for addresses

Version 2.0
Open source and verifiable.

"Don't trust, verify."

%1$s

Your privacy is absolute.

1. 100%% Offline: This app has no internet permission.
2. No Tracking: We do not collect data, analytics, or personal information.
3. Ephemeral: Keys are generated in RAM and cleared when the app closes.

⚠️ IMPORTANT ON RECOVERY:
• You can regenerate your private key using the SAME seed in this app.
• If someone else finds your seed, they can also regenerate your key.
• Keep your seed SAFE and PRIVATE.
